bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, 1.5" lower HS bearing, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon full monocoque, OS race for 1.5" bearing
1 1/8 upper and 1 1/5" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, carbon 8mm cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set, 3D forged 7050 aluminum, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Specialized Turbo Pro, 700x23c, aramid bead, 127TPI, w/ Double Black Belt protection
Specialized Turbo Pro, 700x23c, aramid bead, 127TPI, w/ Double Black Belt protection
Body Geometry Romin Comp w/ hollow Cr-Mo rails
Specialized Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
